definition: to wail/to cry out in distress
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Four-four was Madame de Genlis's signal.
sentences.chinese: 四下接四下是让利斯夫人的呼号。

sentences.english: And I was very angry when I heard their cry and these words.
sentences.chinese: 我听见他们呼号说这些话，便甚发怒。

sentences.english: The trees bent as the north wind howled through them.
sentences.chinese: 北风呼号而过，树都吹弯了。

sentences.english: It was a road from singing for himself to crying out for people.
sentences.chinese: 他走的是一条从为个人咏叹到为人民呼号的道路。

sentences.english: Sorry, you are not authorized to update the callsign database.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，您无权以更新呼号数据库。

sentences.english: Neither is stimulus of old factories or yelling in frustration and anger.
sentences.chinese: 陈旧工厂的激怒或是沮丧与悲愤中的呼号也不能。

sentences.english: It glowed redly in the gloom, just for a moment, and then faded.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗中呼号散发着诡秘的红光，然后又暗了下来。

sentences.english: What was William Adama's call sign?
sentences.chinese: 威廉。阿达玛的呼号是什么？

sentences.english: Echoes of cries of pain rever berate in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 痛苦的呼号的回声在我心里回荡。

sentences.english: The enigmatic Marine, Shane Schofield, who goes by the call-sign "Scarecrow."
sentences.chinese: 神秘的海洋，肖恩菲尔德，谁的呼号“稻草人去。”

sentences.english: What is your name and call sign?
sentences.chinese: 你的船名和呼号是什么？

sentences.english: I'm sorry, I didn't copy your callsign. Please again slowly.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我没有抄收你的呼号，请慢慢重复。

sentences.english: What is your name, call sign?
What is the last letter in your call sign?
sentences.chinese: 你呼号的最后一个字母是什么？

definition: to roar (of animals)/to wail/to cry out in distress/see also 呼號|呼号[hu1 hao2]
to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎
(of animals, the wind etc) to make a mournful sound/whine/moan/wail
